name: General Legal
long_description: We're the AI native law firm that solves commercial legal for founders. Our firm provides fast, high-quality contract drafting, review, and negotiation for a flat fee. We save founders $100s-$1000s per contract, turn contracts in hours instead of days, and our expert attorneys provide practical, real-time guidance to get deals closed safely.
one_liner: The AI native law firm for growth stage companies
